comment: Паскаль баркает в произвольной точке зоны один раз

languages.text: "Убранство этого судна полно особо древних и священных механизмов! Сколь велик был сей храм!"
"This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"
languages.original_text: "Убранство этого судна полно особо древних и священных механизмов! Сколь велик был сей храм!"

traits.locale_text: "This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"
"This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"
"This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"
"This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"
"This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"
"This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"

languages.text: 「この船はいたるところに超古代の聖なる機械があふれている！なんてすばらしい神殿だったのだろうか！」
languages.original_text: "This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"

traits.locale_text: 「この船はいたるところに超古代の聖なる機械があふれている！なんてすばらしい神殿だったのだろうか！」

languages.text: “这艘船满载着极其古老而神圣的机械装置！它曾是一座多么伟大的神殿啊！”
languages.original_text: "This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"

traits.locale_text: “这艘船满载着极其古老而神圣的机械装置！它曾是一座多么伟大的神殿啊！”

languages.text: « Ce vaisseau regorge de mécanismes particulièrement anciens et extrêmement sacrés ! Ce devait être un temple prodigieux ! »
languages.original_text: "This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce vaisseau regorge de mécanismes particulièrement anciens et extrêmement sacrés ! Ce devait être un temple prodigieux ! »

languages.text: «¡Esta nave contiene antiguos mecanismos sagrados de extraordinaria calidad! ¡Debía de ser un templo impresionante!».
languages.original_text: "This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Esta nave contiene antiguos mecanismos sagrados de extraordinaria calidad! ¡Debía de ser un templo impresionante!».

languages.text: "Dieses Schiff ist durch und durch mit uralten und heiligen Mechanismen ausgestattet! Es war einmal ein fantastischer Tempel!"
languages.original_text: "This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Schiff ist durch und durch mit uralten und heiligen Mechanismen ausgestattet! Es war einmal ein fantastischer Tempel!"

languages.text: "Bu gemi, olağanüstü kadimlikte ve kutsallıkta mekanizmalarla donatılmış! Eskiden ne muazzam bir tapınakmış!"
languages.original_text: "This vessel is furnished throughout with extraordinarily ancient and sacred mechanisms! What a great temple it used to be!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu gemi olağanüstü derecede kadim ve kutsal mekanizmalarla donatılmış! Eskiden ne kadar da muazzam bir tapınakmış!"
